meanings.definition: A Hawaiian fish, also known as the wahoo.
meanings.sent1: The ono swam gracefully in the clear waters.
meanings.sent2: I caught a big ono while fishing in Hawaii.
meanings.sent3: The ono winked at the other fish, showing off its speed.
meanings.sent4: The ono's silver scales shimmered like moonlight on the ocean.
meanings.sent5: Children gathered excitedly to see the ono at the aquarium.

meanings.definition: A Hawaiian word meaning delicious or tasty.
meanings.sent1: The dessert was so ono that I couldn't stop eating it.
meanings.sent2: The ono poke at the luau was a crowd favorite.
meanings.sent3: Grandma's cooking always turns out ono, making everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The ono flavors danced on my taste buds with each bite.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the ono dish filled the room, making everyone hungry.
